channel.title: [PI] BloodBarrage - The remake
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm looking for 3 to 4 coders who are willing to help me to re-code my old server i used to have. I quit coding since a year or two ago and started coding again about 3 months ago, so basically my journey has re-started. I'm looking for coders who can do basic stuff, as i forgot a sh-tload of coding.
If anyone could help me, please private message me or add me on msn:
taurushelp@live.be
I am just using a cleaned client, so there's no point in showing screens, didn't do anything to it yet so yeah. Lol.

item.title: [PI] BloodBarrage - The remake
item.dc:creator: @Exed Exed
item.description:
@Exed wrote:

It’d be cool if you brought this back, I used to play. Hopefully you fix the combat system for ranging though, I remember it used to be over powered

Read full topic
